changeSet.author: abhijeet.hambir
changeSet.createProcedure: CREATE PROCEDURE [ViWeb].[DeleteVIwebAccessToken] @key varchar(100) AS BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON; Delete from ViWeb.ViwebAccessToken where [key]=@key END
changeSet.sql: GRANT EXECUTE ON ViWeb.DeleteVIwebAccessToken TO db_apionly;
changeSet.rollback: REVOKE EXECUTE ON ViWeb.DeleteVIwebAccessToken FROM db_apionly; DROP PROCEDURE ViWeb.DeleteVIwebAccessToken;
